body.value:
Labdoo provides a communication tool to help labdooers manage their own projects and activities in collaboration with other labdooers. We call this feature "Labdoo teams". Each team organizes around a theme or topic, and users can join a team or many teams depending on their interests. "List All Teams" provides a current list of the topics available and a short description on each topic.
Click on the topic you are interested at the teams list will bring you into its team where the team communication takes place.
Users may check teams conversations and tasks under "Teams Wall" or "My Teams Wall".
Users with the "team manager" role can create their own new teams and communities around them.
